name: terseness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the use of few words to say something, sometimes in a way that seems rude or unfriendly: He answered with uncharacteristic terseness, "Yes, to both". See
terse
More examplesFewer examples He now believes their terseness was to avoid giving themselves away.Similarly, terseness can come across as rudeness.Hemingway is noted for his distinct style of writing, characterized by terseness and his use of stable, indifferent, male protagonists. With characteristic terseness, he said, "I want you in every meeting."
